Clean Skin Add new Makeup submit Add to Calendar Brand Add New Makeup Lipstick Eye Brow Blush Eyeshadow Product Information: Tips: Nail Polish Eye Liner Eyelashes Foundation Concealer Lip Gloss Powder Mascara Moisturizer ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Why is Cruelty free makeup important? As we know today that more and more makeup brands are producing cruelty makeup. Cruelty free isn\'t just a hashtag or a trend to jump on. It a movement that was first started by Lady Dowding back in 1959 when she introduced "Beauty without cruelty". She persuaded manufacturers to use fake fur instead of real fur. How would you know if your makeup is cruelty free? Here is a quick link to Cruelty Free Kitty They have a list of the most current brands that are Cruelty Free -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Concealer can last up to can last up to 1 Year. If it starts to smell or clump up trow it away immediately Types of Blush: Cream, Liquid, and Powder To keep blush longevity, it is highly suggested to wash your brushes home button Type of Eyeliner: Liquid, and Pencil Just like Mascara it isn\'t ideal to share with other people Types of Eyebrow: Pencil, Pomade, Gel, and Powder Pencil will last longer than the pomade and gel due to being sharpened on a constant basis Types of Mascara: Waterproof,and Regular If Mascara is unopened, the shelf life will be up to 3 years Types of Foundation: Liquid, Cream, Powder, BB creams and CC creams Keeping Foundation germ free is to keep fingers away from the product. if any discoloration and separation occurs, throw the product away immediately Types of Lip Gloss: Meant for high shine If Discoloration and separation occurs throw away immediately ---source from https://www.bllashes.com/blogs/blog/how-long-can-eyelash-glue-last Eyelashes Depend on three things, when the glue is manufactured , when the glue is opened for the first time , and how it\'s stored ---source Cleanser active ingredients tend to lose effectiveness after six months of usage
Types of Eyeshadow: Cream, and Powder Powder eyeshadow\'s do last longer like powder blush, however it is ideal to replace more often since we use it around our eyes Generally can expire one to two years after the manufacturing date. Over time, the masks can become irritating to your face as the chemicals and ingredients within them begin to break down. Source from Dailyvanity.sg. Active ingredients, particularly glycolic and fruit acids, will become more potent and hence more irritating for your skin – so toss those expired face masks out ASAP Lipstick doesn\’t hold much bacteria, so it can last between 12 – 18 months. Since powders don\'t contain water it is very hard for bacteria to grow Types of powders: Highlighters and translucent powder Over time and depending on the conditions in which you keep your moisturizer, you\’ll start to notice a difference in color and even smell. If this happens, say goodbye to that bottle. “Nail polishes tend to get thick, dry and sticky after a year or so,” says Dr.Shainhouse . Though she adds that you can try to thin them out by adding acetone. But if they start going bitter, let them go. An expired lotion doesn\’t hurt or damage skin, but the product won\’t lock in moisture or hydrate as thoroughly. Sealed and unopened bottles should be good for three years. This page is use to track upcoming appointment or to remind you to make an skin treatment appointment
